Name: Chamomile
SeedDescription: Plant these in spring. Takes 5 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plántalas estos en primavera. Toma 5 días para madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Frühling. Wächst in 5 Tagen heran.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.fr: Plantez-les au printemps. Prend 5 jours pour grandir.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.hu: Ezeket tavasszal ültesd el. 5 napig tart megérniük.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ja: 春植えの花。5日かけて花を咲かせる。
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as na Primavera. Demoram 5 dias para amadurecerem.
